question: Who are our top 10 most engaged customers based on event activity?
query: SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, c.email, COUNT(e.event_id) as event_count FROM customers c JOIN events e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.name, c.email ORDER BY event_count DESC LIMIT 10
reasoning: Joins customers with events, counts events per customer, and returns top 10 by activity
